subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Newton, a 6-foot-5, 245-pound force, led the Panthers to a victory over the Colts on Monday. For a franchise that has never started a season with seven wins in a row, this is all new ground.
snippet: Newton, a 6-foot-5, 245-pound force, led the Panthers to a victory over the Colts on Monday. For a franchise that has never started a season with seven wins in a row, this is all new ground.
